Visit.name: Visit
Visit.description: Represents a visit to inspect, assess compliance, or assess an applicantâ€™s ability to get a license or permit or inspect.

AccountID.description: The account that is associated with a visit. This field is available in API versions 48.0 and later.

ActualVisitEndTime.description: The date and time when the visit ended.

ActualVisitStartTime.description: The date and time when the visit started.

ContextId.description: The purpose of a visit, such as business license application, or complaint. This field is available in API versions 48.0 and later.

InspectionOverview.description: The Einstein-generated historical overview of current and previous inspection visits.

InstructionDescription.description: Special instructions provided by a compliance manager or an administrator.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the visit record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the visit record owner.

ParentVisitId.description: The parent visit associated with the current visit.

PlaceId.description: ID of the place that inspector visits.

PlannedVisitEndTime.description: The date and time when the visit is expected to end.

PlannedVisitStartTime.description: The date and time when the visit is expected to start.

StatusRemarks.description: The reasons for abandoning or completing the visit as provided by the inspector.

VisitorId.description: ID of the inspector visiting the store.
